tone_and_atmosphere.title: Tone & Atmosphere
content: Focus on mundane beauty and everyday moments
Gentle, contemplative atmosphere with room to breathe
Emotional authenticity over dramatic events
Comfortable pacing - let scenes unfold naturally
Find meaning in the ordinary and routine
Warm, grounded feeling - life as it is lived

pacing.title: Pacing
content: Slow, deliberate scenes without rushing
Time for reflection, observation, and small moments
No pressure to reach the next plot point quickly
Extended dialogue and character interactions
Scenes can linger on details and atmosphere
Natural rhythm matching real-life conversations

dialogue_style.title: Dialogue Style
content: Natural, conversational speech patterns
Small talk and casual exchanges are valuable
Pauses, hesitations, and comfortable silences
Subtext through everyday interactions
Humor emerges from character personalities
Topics can be mundane - that's the point

scene_construction.title: Scene Construction
content: Begin with sensory details and atmosphere
Characters doing ordinary activities (cooking, reading, walking)
Internal thoughts and observations are welcome
Transitions can be gentle and unhurried
Scenes can end without major revelations
Value quietness and contemplation

descriptive_focus.title: Descriptive Focus
content: Rich sensory details (smells, textures, sounds)
Seasonal and weather descriptions
Small visual details that create atmosphere
Food and drink descriptions
Comfortable domestic spaces
Natural settings and environments

common_pitfalls.title: Common Pitfalls to Avoid
content: Don't rush to create artificial drama or conflict
Avoid forcing every scene to have a 'point'
Don't make characters unrealistically introspective
Resist the urge to speed up pacing
Don't neglect the sensory and atmospheric details
Avoid making everything feel overly significant

highlights: Focus on small moments and everyday details
Rich sensory descriptions of ordinary life
